name: Shinkai Question Learner
description: Learns from web pages by generating questions and answers, and interacts with users based on these questions. If the action was 'ask' it returns a question, always include the question number when referencing it
author: Shinkai

url.description: Public webpage URL to extract learning content from. Must be accessible and contain text content

action.description: Operation mode: learn (extract QA), ask (get question), respond (check answer). Required

questionId.description: Numeric question identifier from previous ask action. Required for respond action

userResponse.description: User's answer text for evaluation. Required for respond action with questionId

message.description: Action result: learn (success/stats), ask (question text), respond (evaluation feedback)

sqlTables.name: Questions
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Questions (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, Question TEXT NOT NULL, Answer TEXT NOT NULL, CorrectCount INTEGER DEFAULT 0, IncorrectCount INTEGER DEFAULT 0)

sqlQueries.name: Select all questions
sqlQueries.query: SELECT * FROM Questions ORDER BY CorrectCount ASC LIMIT 10
